entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
